scripts.clean: rm -rf bun.lock && find . -name node_modules -prune -o \( -name .next -o -name .turbo \) -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && bunx npkill --delete-all -y
scripts.build:android: cd apps/mobile && flutter build aab --dart-define-from-file=.env --flavor production --target lib/main_production.dart
scripts.build:android:dev: cd apps/mobile && flutter build aab --dart-define-from-file=.env --flavor development --target lib/main_development.dart
scripts.build:ios: cd apps/mobile && flutter build ios --dart-define-from-file=.env --flavor production --target lib/main_production.dart
scripts.build:ios:dev: cd apps/mobile && flutter build ios --dart-define-from-file=.env --flavor development --target lib/main_development.dart
scripts.dev:mobile: cd apps/mobile && flutter run --dart-define-from-file=.env --flavor development --target lib/main_development.dart
scripts.devx: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev
scripts.devx:web: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:web
scripts.devx:calendar: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:calendar
scripts.devx:rewise: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:rewise
scripts.devx:nova: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:nova
scripts.devx:shortener: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:shortener
scripts.devx:meet: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun dev:meet
scripts.devx:finance: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:finance
scripts.devx:tasks: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:tasks
scripts.devx:track: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:track
scripts.devrs: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev
scripts.devrs:web: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:web
scripts.devrs:calendar: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:calendar
scripts.devrs:rewise: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:rewise
scripts.devrs:finance: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:finance
scripts.devrs:nova: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:nova
scripts.devrs:shortener: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:shortener
scripts.devrs:meet: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:meet
scripts.devrs:tasks: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:tasks
scripts.devrs:track: bun sb:stop && bun sb:start && bun sb:reset && bun dev:track
scripts.ff: biome format --write && biome lint --write && biome check --write
scripts.i18n:check: i18n-check -l apps/web/messages apps/calendar/messages apps/finance/messages apps/nova/messages apps/rewise/messages apps/tasks/messages apps/meet/messages apps/track/messages -s en -f i18next -o missingKeys invalidKeys -i landing.pricing.plans.enterprise.period
scripts.sbr:reset: cd apps/database && bun sbr:reset && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sbr:diff: cd apps/database && bun sbr:diff && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sbr:up: cd apps/database && bun sbr:up && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sbr:sync: cd apps/database && bun sbr:sync && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sbr:pull: cd apps/database && bun sbr:pull && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sbr:push: cd apps/database && bun sbr:push && bun sbr:typegen
scripts.sb:reset: cd apps/database && bun sb:reset && bun sb:typegen
scripts.sb:diff: cd apps/database && bun sb:up && bun sb:diff && bun sb:typegen
scripts.sb:up: cd apps/database && bun sb:up && bun sb:typegen
scripts.sb:pull: cd apps/database && bun sb:pull && bun sb:typegen
scripts.sb:push: cd apps/database && bun sb:push && bun sb:typegen
